about_the_game: This is an emulator for an old 16bit Japanese home computer from the late 1980s. The computer included hardware that was very similar to the arcade hardware of the time, which allowed it to run arcade-perfect ports of many then-popular games, as well as fostering a thriving homebrew community that is known for its punishing and frenetic "shmups".
detailed_description: This is an emulator for an old 16bit Japanese home computer from the late 1980s. The computer included hardware that was very similar to the arcade hardware of the time, which allowed it to run arcade-perfect ports of many then-popular games, as well as fostering a thriving homebrew community that is known for its punishing and frenetic "shmups".

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: RetroArch - PX68k

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
  • Additional Notes: For OpenGL: Intel HD 2K/3K GPUs on Windows 10 will have to fall back to an OpenGL 1.1 driver.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.
  • Additional Notes: For OpenGL: Intel HD 2K/3K GPUs on Windows 10 will have to fall back to an OpenGL 1.1 driver.

short_description: This libretro core emulates a popular gaming-focused home computer from the Japanese market in the late 1980s.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
